alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 5:35PM PDT until April 11 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches for Stevens Pass. 1 to 3 inches valley snow accumulations. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
